sentences.sContent: The seal on the box broke when it fell from its hiding-place.
sentences.sCn: 盒子从隐藏处掉下时上面的封口破了。

sentences.sContent: He sealed the envelope and put on a stamp.
sentences.sCn: 他封好信封，贴了张邮票。

sentences.sContent: Write your letter and seal it in a blank envelope.
sentences.sCn: 写好你的信，然后将其封入一个空信封。

synos.tran: [机]密封；印章；[皮革][脊椎]海豹；封条；标志

phrases.pCn: n. 橡胶密封圈；橡皮垫；橡胶塞；橡皮密封
轴封，轴封装置；主轴密封
迷宫式密封；曲径密封垫片

remMethod.val: sea(海洋) + l(看作love， 爱) → 海水也不会冲走爱的封印 → 封印

words.tran: 封闭，[机] 密封；补铸件的漏洞；猎捕海豹业
盖印人；检验员；密封层；捕海豹的船或猎人

trans.tranCn: 封铅，封条，封印；印章；海豹
trans.tranOther: a large sea animal that eats fish and lives around coasts
When you seal an envelope, you close it by folding part of it over and sticking it down, so that it cannot be opened without being torn
